lk.name: Jm Media

FM Radio reach is limited to Sri Lanka, and if one misses a program he/she cannot retrieve and listen it. But in online Web Radio reach is Global and listeners can listen at their convenience irrespective of the country, place or time. Therefore, International online Radio was launched by Mr. M.M. lk.description: Uthayan is a Tamil language Sri Lankan daily newspaper published by New Uthyan Publication (Private) Limited, part of the Uthayan Group of Newspapers. It was founded in 1985 and is published from Jaffna. Its sister newspapers is the Colombo based Sudar Oli. Uthayan was the only newspaper published from Jaffna which did not cease publication due to the civil war. The newspaper has been attacked several times, a number of its staff have been murdered by paramilitary groups and other forces, and it regularly receives threats.
